entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
